content:
Just made another rollup https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/89992
and when I launched x.py test locally, I got an error
tidy error: /home/matthias/vcs/github/rust/compiler/rustc_resolve/src/lib.rs: too many lines (3043) (add // ignore-tidy-filelength to the file to suppress this error)
welp

should I just add the ignore label for now? splitting up the file probably requires some deeper refactoring and I think we would hit the limit anyway, sooner or later, be it by merging a rollup or merging the PRs one by one
@matthiaskrgr #89992 attempted to remove the tidy-filelength check. I unapproved it for now, I would just make a new rollup without it.
